title: France panorama. [No. 72/10]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Arts and gifts - the Traditional Arts and Gifts salon. Youth by Bernard Buffet - the yearly Buffet exhibition. The 1000th Alouette III - the 1000th Alouette III is delivered to an American company. High-tension laboratory - a new test-lab for transformers. 2. New academic Etienne Wolff - the famed biologist and director of the College de France replaces Professor Pasteur Valery-Radot.
